resources.string: Flourish & Blotts sells a great variety of magic books, including textbooks for Hogwarts courses other books of general magical interest.

The Three Broomsticks is a well known inn and pub located on High Street in the village of Hogsmeade. It is known for its delicious butterbeer and its beautiful owner Madam Rosmerta, who lives above the pub.

Honeydukes is a popular sweets shop located in Hogsmeade that is usually crowded with Hogwarts students and occasionally even the professors of Hogwarts. The shop is filled with many different kinds of wonderful and wild sweets,such as Bertie Botts Every Flavoured Beans, Cauldron Cakes, Blood-Flavoured Lollipops, Acid Pops, and so much more.
Located on a little side street off the main High Street, Madam Puddifoot\'s is a small teashop favourite among Hogwarts couples out on dates.
